title: Automated Refund Processing
description: As a customer service representative, I want to process refunds quickly so that customers receive their money back promptly and maintain satisfaction.
acceptance_criteria: CS rep can initiate refund from order details page
System supports full and partial refunds
Refund is processed through original payment method
Customer receives email notification of refund initiation
Refund status is tracked (pending, processed, completed)
System calculates refund amount including tax adjustments
Refund appears in customer account within specified timeframe
All refund transactions are logged for audit purposes

comments.author: Business Analyst
comments.text: Refund policy: Credit cards 5-7 days, PayPal 24-48 hours.

comments.author: QA Lead
comments.text: Testing various refund scenarios. Found edge case with partial refunds on discounted items.
